body.text: We aim to expand the North America land transport network while improving efficiency and reducing carbon footprint. By meeting the
core interests of all parties involved
, including the shipper, truck driver, and receiver, we can achieve higher transportation efficiency and benefit all stakeholders.

. Additionally, shipping companies can now easily match with available drivers

Drivers' Benefits:
- Drivers can directly connect with shippers, eliminating exorbitant intermediary fees.
- Increased opportunities and attainment of remuneration aligned with expectations.
- Intelligent matching, generating higher revenue through optimized routing and order allocation.

Suppliers' Benefits:
- Access to a wider selection of top-rated, high-performing drivers.
- No additional overhead, leading to reduced operational expenses.
- Monitoring of freight logistics details, ensuring secure and reliable transportation.

- Reduce the number of shipping trips (reduce carbon footprint, improve transportation efficiency).
- Truck drivers can pay less commission to middlemen (for example, from 10% to 5%).
- Shippers have more choices and don't have to pay extra.
- Shippers can view driver evaluations (to ensure the safety of goods).
